programme.title: Lajja
programme.desc: The Film follows four women from different backgrounds in India as they unite to fight against misogyny and violence in their society. Forced marriage, domestic abuse, and honor killings are just some of the struggles they face. Through their determination, they discover the strength of the human spirit, inspiring others to join their fight for justice. With a powerful cast and storyline, sheds light on important social issues and the fight for women's rights. Will these women succeed in creating a better future for themselves and future generations?

programme.title: Hum To Mohabbat Karega
programme.desc: To pursue his love interest, TV reporter Geeta, Raju misleads the police with false clues during a murder investigation. His lies soon land him in trouble with the police and the mafia.

programme.title: Teri Talash Mein (dub)(unnaruge Naan Irundhal Tamil)
programme.desc: After her father's sudden death, Mahalakshmi is left to clear his debts and face the harsh villagers. A taxi driver helps her cremate her father and pledges his taxi to earn her a temporary reprieve.

programme.title: Lucky-No Time For Love
programme.desc: A story of Lucky, a yound girl who is taken in by a wealthy family in Russia after being orphaned in war-torn Afghanistan . While adapting to her new surroundings, she meets a man who is initially distant and unapproachable, but eventually spend more time together and form a deep bond. Despite facing cultural differences and other obstacles, their love perseveres as they strive to be together.

programme.title: Mitti
programme.desc: Deva, a villager, goes on a violent rampage to avenge his sister's rape, and soon finds himself battling both the criminals responsible and the police.

programme.title: Abhimanyu
programme.desc: Panni wreaks havoc in the lives of Manu and Tulsi, forcing them to leave the village. Years later, they return to exact a not-so-sweet revenge upon Panni.

programme.title: Rootha Na Karo
programme.desc: Naina is in love with Sudhir and is disheartened when she learns he is in love with her cousin, Neeta. She attempts to separate them by creating misunderstandings between them.

programme.title: Vidrohi
programme.desc: Vidrohi is an action drama. The movie follows the story of an honest officer, Inspector Devendra Pratap Singh, whose only priority is to protect the law. He takes great risks to catch the dreaded dacoits Naag Singh and Bhoop Singh, however, the duo decide to surrender themselves to Police on the advice of a cunning man, who has a plan to protect them, and also make it hard for Devendra. Later, Devendra is arrested on the charges of murder of Bhoop Singh, however, he escapes the prison, when he learns about Bhoop Singh and Naag Singh’s plan. He then embarks the journey to catch the culprits and prove his innocence. Will he succeed in his mission

programme.title: Hasina Maan Jayegi
programme.desc: Rakesh and Kamal, doppelgangers of one another, fall for the same woman, Archana. However, when their petty rivalry evolves into something more sinister, she must find her true love.

programme.title: Hasina Maan Jayegi
programme.desc: Rakesh and Kamal, doppelgangers of one another, fall for the same woman, Archana. However, when their petty rivalry evolves into something more sinister, she must find her true love.

programme.title: Nirbhay
programme.desc: After a mother abandons her child and leaves him in an orphanage, he is falsely accused of two murders and faces jail term. After he walks out of prison, he seeks revenge from the culprits.

programme.title: Beti
programme.desc: Sudha assumes a recent acquaintance is the man she's being asked to marry and agrees to the match. When she realises her mistake it's too late, and she has to choose between love and family honour.

programme.title: Dil Aur Mohabbat
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a policeman raises his son all by himself and expects the latter to be a good person. However, the policeman is left disappointed after the son grows up.

programme.title: Nirbhay
programme.desc: After a mother abandons her child and leaves him in an orphanage, he is falsely accused of two murders and faces jail term. After he walks out of prison, he seeks revenge from the culprits.

programme.title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
programme.desc: Roopa does not get along with Prakash, her husband, and suspects he is having an affair. Things take a turn when she starts spreading vile rumours about Sharda, a woman living next door.

programme.title: Santosh
programme.desc: A wealthy woman falls in love with a poor man, whom she marries and has a child with, but soon she longs for her old life and abandons both her husband and son. She remarries a rich man, with whom she has another son. Years later, the two boys find themselves on opposite sides of a struggle.

programme.title: Naya Daur
programme.desc: When the son of a landlord decides to modernize his business by replacing the horse carts with buses, a horse cart rider decides to challenge him.

programme.title: Waqt Ki Deewar
programme.desc: A cruel and lustful man brutally rapes a woman, forcing her to commit suicide, leaving her young children homeless. The children try to stay together but are separated. Years later, one of them has taken to a life of crime with a friend, who, unbeknownst to him, is none other than his mother's rapist.

programme.title: Rajesh Khanna – The Superstar's Anthems
programme.desc: Revisit the unmatched charm of Rajesh Khanna with this jukebox of unforgettable melodies. Romantic, philosophical, and heartfelt – these songs defined an era and a superstar.

programme.title: Baggage
programme.desc: The film is about Sara’s journey as she goes about understanding her role in the greater scheme of things. Sara - who has lost her twin sister to a mysterious vanishing - is trying to come to grips with her loss.

programme.title: Bully
programme.desc: In This Psychological Thriller, A girl who is holding her brother hostage must confront the darker aspects of her life and come face to face with the truth.

programme.title: Beyond Failing
programme.desc: This film captures intricate nuances of student stress, competition the so called rat race, parent child relation and purposeless living vs. purposeful living.

programme.title: Bhagwaan - The Faith
programme.desc: A final chance meeting with a mysterious old homeless man changes everything they’ve experienced that day. The story delves into how deep their faith truly is and how people worship gods. Some use faith and god as a means of solace while others as a crutch for a troubling life.

programme.title: Bharam
programme.desc: A Hindi drama short film about an executive visiting a house to give away a Mercedes won by a housewife in a lucky draw and the confusion that follows.

programme.title: Bindu
programme.desc: Bindu, a little school-going girl, and his older brother Gaurav live in the hilly regions where they barely make their day’s end meet. Gaurav works in the early shifts as a paperman, delivering news on his cycle, and finds time in between for Bindu to take her to school. A stitched-up overused shoe, an old ragged school bag, Bindu becomes the epitome of being a struggling unprivileged kid while Gaurav holds on to his pair of old sandals, the same pair of dress, and an old cycle.

programme.title: Blurred Lines
programme.desc: 24-year-old Apoorva is caught in a tangle of relationships when she has an epiphany that she is attracted to her best friend who has come to dress her up to meet prospective in laws.

programme.title: Bridge
programme.desc: Mukesh is a widower and has a 28-year-old so Rahul. They live together and rarely talk amicably with each other. Rahul thinks his father is too weird for his age whereas Mukesh thinks why Rahul constantly judges him for his choices.

programme.title: Calling Bell
programme.desc: A psychopath Biriyani Delivery boy barges into the house of a young lady and threatens to kill her. The story revolves around this confrontation between these two characters. The climax of the story turns out to be something very unexpected.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: We all have a fantastic life but we spoil it with our silly ideas of how to live it. This story is about how in trying to define a relationship, we actually end up confining it. One such definition is marriage and this is what is discussed in Cheers by two intimately close friends - one of whom is helping the other decide against a bad marriage that she has chosen to live with for some time now, thus stifling herself from all the happiness she is entitled to. While the intent of the friend seem questionable, the story is about why she trusts him more than anyone else with this issue that she is facing

programme.title: Tohfa
programme.desc: A gentleman bestowed upon his cherished wife an incredibly valuable and heartwarming present, yet fate had a different plan in store for their journey.

programme.title: Chashmishq
programme.desc: A tale of two budding lovers, their glasses, and the unforeseen challenges that come between their first kiss.

programme.title: Live A Little Part 2
programme.desc: After 5 years, Nimisha and Atish meet again at a party. She is awarded Best Emerging Entrepreneur by none other than Atish. Atish couldn't let another day go by without confronting Nimisha. Both seem happy and has moved on in their lives until they realize they've been living in a delusion. They reminded each other of their Pact which was made 5 years ago. Live a Little . Then made sudden plans which led to unexpected confessions which led to the most memorable night of their lives.

programme.title: Alvida
programme.desc: Break-ups can be hard, but sometimes they are necessary. Sometimes, you need all your strength to let go and say ... Alvida.

programme.title: Something Like Love
programme.desc: Something like love is the story of Karan and Simran, who have perceived love differently all their lives. Karan's love language is poetry, and for Simran, if love isn't DDLJ, it isn't love.

programme.title: Pravaah The Flow
programme.desc: This story is about this Nature photographer Shivoham. Through his travel, he likes to explore and capture wonderful, breath taking creations of nature and places. But how can a journey be complete, without interesting escapades? 5 different locations, 5 different interactions revealing the darkest secrets, depth of life, deep hidden emotions and finally, ending the journey with an experience that leaves him all rejuvenated…as if he had a new birth and gets him all set for the next one.

programme.title: Ramdeen (now & Then)
programme.desc: This is a story based on the deep-rooted stance of feudalism in two chosen timelines; 1965 and present-day respectively. The protagonist Ramesh, is a skinny, middle-aged man who works as an office boy at a production house, despite having a mundane and monotonous lifestyle he is very kind, well-spoken, and calm by nature. The stories of Ramdin and Ramesh unravel back and forth and give us a compelling idea about how instilled the concept of feudalism is, in societies new and old.

programme.title: Saanjh
programme.desc: SAANJH tells the story of Shyam and Sandhya, childhood friends who meet for the last time. Shyam loves Sandhya, but she sees him only as a friend. We surprisingly learn that Shyam is actually struggling with mental disorder, and Sandhya is nothing but just in his imagination. Despite the calm riverbank setting, Shyam's inner struggles are evident. As Shyam faces reality, he realizes he must accept things as they are, showing the power of love and understanding ourselves.

programme.title: Samaapan
programme.desc: This is the story of a Pandit, Tribhu Pandey. One day while returning from a funeral feast comes across a mysterious skull in the forest with many secrets.

programme.title: Yaantrik
programme.desc: Siddharth is a novelist. He is known for his different types of writing patterns. He always talks to his soul for some creative suggestions. Now he wants to write about a character called "Yaantrik". Siddharth wants to write a book on Yaantrik but this time as an experiment he wants to become a Yaantrik and then write a book. He will follow the routine of Yaantrik. His inner soul is not convinced with this idea. After being blocked in his own idea how his inner soul helped him out is the film.

programme.title: Life 2.0
programme.desc: Life 2.0 is the reflection of modern life, where Humans have become like God. GOD means generator, operator & destroyer but look at us, what are we doing; we are also doing the same.

programme.title: Khalish
programme.desc: Everyday violence in the household plagues the childhood of a girl. The helplessness and anxiety that arises from such an experience builds in her as she grows up. Her aversion to authority manifests itself in extreme outcomes later.

programme.title: Laugh
programme.desc: A film about who we were and who we've become , how socialising was and where its reached ,how something as simple as laughing has taken a complicated turn

programme.title: Duty
programme.desc: Different classes in society are intertwined, with each person's actions impacting others. When individuals from various classes fulfil their responsibilities, stability is achieved. This story explores fairness and the expression of duty among people from different social strata.

programme.title: The Decision
programme.desc: The Struggle of a Female Actress in the Film Industry: A young woman faces difficulties when working with a demanding director who creates a stressful environment. She expresses her concerns to the producer, but he reacts angrily and uses harsh language toward her. Will the actress decide to find a way to work together or stand up for herself?

programme.title: Game Of Caste
programme.desc: Game of Caste centers on Rakesh, an ordinary man visiting his aunt in her native village. He's initially captivated by the village's beauty but soon confronts a harsh reality: the mistreatment of a lower-caste boy by the villagers. This revelation shocks him, leading to his determined fight for the boy's rights. The overarching question remains: can he succeed in this battle between humanity and caste discrimination?

programme.title: Bena
programme.desc: After a set of jewelry goes missing, the police search Bena's bag. Her employers, Bhai and Bhabhi, are shocked to see the contents. They throw her out and Bena spends the day calling people for jobs. The family driver calls Bena and informs her that the set was found. Bena knew that the set would be found as it was misplaced not stolen. Next, she gets a call for a new job. Bena finds out that her employer Bhabhi had recommended Bena. Why was Bena thrown out of her job? What in the bag?

programme.title: Beshak
programme.desc: Story of a couple where the wife couldn’t find the difference between dream and reality and doubt enters into the relationship!

programme.title: Choices
programme.desc: Ritesh and Yami are just a day away from their marriage, and ritesh makes a confession which may affect their upcoming relationship, or maybe not?

programme.title: Cratch
programme.desc: When two individuals coming from two different parts of society with completely distinctive thought processes COLLIDE there would be Chaos, Confusion & a lot of disagreement, but would there ever be an eye-opening conversation? Watch this short to find out Kamrul's unique take on Life and how it affects Manay's perception towards it.

programme.title: Days Left Behind
programme.desc: A man struggles to survive in a post-apocalyptic India where the World has been devastated by a deadly virus that turns people into wild cannibalistic creatures, until one day he comes across an abandoned car.

programme.title: Desh Ki Pardesh ?
programme.desc: The film follows the Parikh's on their visit to their children settled in the US. However, to only realize that there's a lot more than just a generation gap between them. Mainly, dawning upon Hasmuk Parikh's that it's great to dream big for your children, but one must be mentally prepared that those dreams may or not have them in it.

programme.title: Destiny's Two
programme.desc: Mohan and his dwarf wife have come to Mumbai from Gujarat for his work. They are a newly wed couple. Their marriage is a compromise, as they do not see the spouse of their imagination in each other. Mohan who gets fascinated seeing taller women realizes the same about his wife. He decides to go to a red light area to fulfill his desire. But does he do it?

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Even in this modern era, there are several religious conflicts around us. We start judging a stranger based on his/her religion or culture. This short film is a humble attempt trying to reduce the distance between religions and thereby portraying religious bondage.

programme.title: Charitra Varnan
programme.desc: A cab driver comes across a woman standing and crying along the roadside. He tries to help her and tells her that he would drop her home safely. What happens next will leave you stunned.

programme.title: First Sin
programme.desc: What would you do if you unexpectedly obtain magical powers? Ashwath, a failed businessman is having a troubled relationship with his wife . One fine morning he gets a Sand-timer at his door steps. Life takes a turn when he discovers magical powers in it. Will the Sand-timer be a boon or curse ?

programme.title: Harmless
programme.desc: A boy down on his luck. A girl looking for thrills. A plot is hatched. A kidnapping is staged. As far as crimes go, this one seems harmless. But, as with all things, there is a price to pay. A hefty price. Harmless begins as a crime-thriller and develops into a dramatic adventure with a little bit of romance thrown in.

programme.title: Kajal
programme.desc: Like all elements, humans have a saturation point. What happens when a woman a constantly bullied by her boss, harassed by strangers and abused by her husband finds an abandoned package one night? A package that holds an answer to all her demons. A package that triggers an inner change in her the moment that she lays eyes on it. Kohl captures a turning point in the life of a woman, in a world claimed by men.

programme.title: Laxmi
programme.desc: Laxmi works as a maid at the house of a couple. She reaches home early only to find the owners of the house dead. She panics and tells her boyfriend about this. He thinks of a plan and tells her to rob the jewelry and cash from the house. Will she be able to do it? or is she falling for a trap?

programme.title: Scooter
programme.desc: Aniket an entrepreneur is in his hometown, coming after a very long time. Trying to sell his father's home. After spending few hours in that house he goes back into his childhood memories. Aniket as a young boy was very stubborn. This time he was stuck up on a car. Like his many friends, he also wanted to have a car for his family, instead, his father buys a Scooter. He feels very humiliated and refuses to go by it. The story portrays a basic 90s FatherSon relationship

programme.title: Shiva
programme.desc: A narrative following a young boy from the Potraj community, who confronts his stepfather, urging him to conform to tradition rather than pursue his aspiration of education and a brighter future. It underscores Shiva's resilience and support system as he strives to fulfill his dreams against all odds.

programme.title: Signature
programme.desc: A single mother, living in a small village, takes care of her little daughter’s educational expenses by doing tailoring work. One day, she receives a pension letter, for which she has to visit the Gramin bank. There, she encounters something unexpected.

programme.title: The Please Book
programme.desc: Dora is a small girl from a rich family who lives with her father, a busy businessman. Due to his busy schedule, he is unable to spend quality time with her. Dora is very lonely and she does not have any friends. Her loneliness ends when one day she finds an old diary with “The Please Book” written on its cover. Soon she discovers it’s not an ordinary diary but a magical book. She believes that whatever you write in The Please Book, comes true.

programme.title: The Unsent Letter
programme.desc: Nidhi is haunted by her past; she's caged in it when suddenly she gets interrupted by a waiter asking for her order. After she pulls herself together, she realizes that the waiter had called her by her name. Nidhi finds out that the waiter is a man from her past. She is now left with a choice to face her nightmare and finally let go of everything that has haunted her till now or to continue living her life in a cage.

programme.title: Tithlee
programme.desc: Yamini, newly married, is getting ready to meet her mother-in-law, Reema's, friends and family. Reema suggests that Yamini should appear more presentable at the party and implies a preference for fair skin. Both Yamini and Reema's son, Ankush, want to challenge this prejudice, but they have different approaches.

programme.title: U Equals To Me
programme.desc: Nikita and Neeraj know each other well, but their relationship feels awkward. Nikita finds Neeraj's touches repulsive. Aniket has proposed, but she can't let go of Neeraj. Why does she seem stuck between a rock and a hard place? What’s the matter with Neeraj? Is it some deficiency, disability or a disease? It would need a silver bullet to get them together. What if the silver bullet already exists, unknown to them?

programme.title: Jaane Do Mujhe
programme.desc: Nisha is enjoying her date with Aditya, who was set up by her friends. While Aditya is in the washroom, Nisha hears a loud thud and rushes to check on him. She finds Aditya lying unconscious on the floor. Nisha contacts her friend Priya to inform her about the incident. However, Priya tries to reassure Nisha that it's all in her head and there's nothing to worry about. This raises the question of whether Aditya is still alive or if he exists solely in Nisha's imagination.

programme.title: Killer By Chance
programme.desc: The story follows an introverted person who works in an office and has a small circle of friends. He becomes enamored with his female boss, and upon returning home, receives a message from a massage company offering to send a beautiful girl to his place. Initially refusing the offer, he eventually accepts and prepares for her arrival. After a night of partying and sleeping over, a tragic event occurs, revealing the true nature of the introverted man.

programme.title: Swad Anusar
programme.desc: A rich businessman loses his memory after a blow to the head but returns home alive after being thought dead. His family doesn't believe him and he realizes they may have conspired to kill him. He dies after eating poisoned food his wife prepared. His family admits their plot, but he will return with greater vengeance.

programme.title: The Last Act
programme.desc: "THE LAST ACT" follows Chitra, a method actor known for her ability to fully immerse herself into any role. However, as she prepares for her latest performance, she begins to lose touch with reality, seamlessly transitioning between characters and struggling to discern where her performances end and her true self begins.

programme.title: The Friend To Die For
programme.desc: Can the girl survive, despite being abducted by a mentally unstable kidnapper whom society perceives as a serial killer? The truth may reveal a different story than what is commonly believed.

programme.title: Exchange Offer
programme.desc: A complaint registered to the manufacturing company for a dead computer brings back nostalgia and surprises in the life of a retired school principle who is living a mundane life.

programme.title: Faatima
programme.desc: Faatima is a story of two unknown individuals who meet each other for the first time at a cafe and share with each other some very interesting facts only to make us realize that good souls do exist.

programme.title: Faboo
programme.desc: Are we using social media to expand our horizon or are we overusing it and unknowingly desensitizing ourselves. Faboo explores this aspect of social media and nudges us to think about it through this story of a mother and son.

programme.title: Family
programme.desc: Anvith's friend Karthik is leaving school and moving to another city as his parents are getting divorced. This news makes Anvith very sad. The reason for their divorce which Karthik reveals to Anvith is a regular heated argument between Karthik's parents. Then Anvith also starts noticing the same argument between his parents. So, Anvith decides to do everything right so that their parents don't fight, but end up ruining everything which leads to a more heated argument.

programme.title: Firni
programme.desc: The next-door neighbors are having a fight and they send their rude 14-year-old daughter Firni to keep her busy.

programme.title: Firki
programme.desc: It's the way many father's typically behave when their children start driving. The idea of using the navigation tool to highlight the generation gap is also based on my own life experience. The title is Firki because the family is spinning around like a Firki without having reached their destination in the film. It's also depicts how they've been taken for a ride by the navigation app, or as we say in Hindi....Firki le li

programme.title: Happily Married Part 2
programme.desc: Rani & Animesh, a couple who is having an affair with Jimmy plan to meet him on Saturday. The story unfolds as their meeting with Jimmy doesn’t go as planned.

programme.title: Hmm
programme.desc: It all begins at a midnight bus stop, where a girl finds herself unsettled due to a stranger boy's attempts to comfort his girlfriend over a phone call. When his efforts prove unsuccessful, he starts conversing with the girl instead. Despite her apparent reluctance to engage, the boy persists in his conversation, much like a bee unwilling to leave a flower. As the night unfolds, these two unfamiliar individuals end up walking home together. Along the way, they delve into profound discussions about love and relationships. The culmination arrives in a meticulously orchestrated surprise, adding a climactic twist to their journey.

programme.title: Late Lateef
programme.desc: Amir, who is in his mid-20s, is struggling with self-doubt and feeling trapped in his work routine. Unfortunately, his habit of being consistently late has caused him to fall out of favor with many people, including himself. This has created a vicious cycle that he has been unable to break free from despite his best efforts. However, having a supportive inner voice has been a great blessing for him as he tries to push through his struggles.

programme.title: Salwate
programme.desc: The tale of a mother and son trapped in a challenging home situation and how a straightforward life tip helped them escape their predicament.

programme.title: Ruk Jana Nahi
programme.desc: Rinku, a 28-year-old man living with his father, has lost his will to live. However, a wedding in his neighbourhood brings a constant stream of visitors who unknowingly delay his plans and ultimately restore his will to live and succeed.

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: "A young woman returns home after a prolonged absence, enjoying a warm bond with her mother but strained ties with her father. Reconnecting with a previously misjudged acquaintance, she faces revived conflicts with her mother. Tasked with overseeing tuition students, an unforeseen incident alters their lives permanently. Her homecoming: a blessing or a curse?"

programme.title: Adhure Poore Se Hum
programme.desc: Two college time friends embark on a long drive on a Sunday morning, leaving their bustling city lives behind. As they amble through the hilly roads, they reveal to each other, their old longings and hidden pasts. Their rose tinted nostalgia is broken and they come face to face with their imperfect lives.

programme.title: Aflatoon
programme.desc: A narrative unfolding the tale of two brothers residing far from their home, eager to dispatch a sweet treat to their unwell father.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: Annie, who had recently experienced the loss of her unborn child, crosses paths with an enigmatic homeless man one evening. Unbeknownst to her, that meeting was on the brink of altering her life permanently.

programme.title: Antahakaran
programme.desc: As a devout Hindu seeks vengeance, his two associates with conflicting ideologies attempt to manipulate him.

programme.title: Anu Aur Di
programme.desc: Late at night, an angry girl had a fight with her boyfriend and called her sister. She had a big suitcase when her sister picked her up in the car. During the drive, they argued and brought up old problems. Things got worse, and the older sister pushed the younger one against the car window in anger. Their argument stopped suddenly when police lights flashed in the dark, and officers pulled them over. The air was tense with anticipation. What would come to light during this unexpected encounter with the police?

programme.title: Bahar Aa Chaman Prakash
programme.desc: Bahar Aa Chaman Prakash" delves into the story of a man reluctant to marry his lifelong acquaintance. Shutting himself away and avoiding his father, he faces the girl his father wishes him to wed. When she joins him and locks themselves in a room, they emerge with a revelation connected to the man's inner struggles. Will his father embrace this truth?

programme.title: Budhwaar
programme.desc: In this captivating story, a man residing in a village embarks on a journey to purchase a piece of land within his community, seeking assistance from the sarpanch. Despite his wife and the sarpanch's warnings against buying the land on Budhwaar (Wednesday) due to its inauspicious nature, the man disregards their concerns and proceeds with the purchase. Filled with joy, he begins digging the land with aspirations of cultivating vegetables. However, his enthusiasm is short-lived as he soon discovers the land's infertility. His dreams are shattered as the realization dawns upon him that he has fallen victim to a deceitful scheme. What he decides to do next is a must-see, making this story all the more intriguing.

programme.title: 13Th Portal
programme.desc: Everyone in the city wants to touch the sky we have to keep running. There is no time to relax, one has to move on or get mowed down. 13th portal talks about a city like that. A city that’s brutal in its ideologies yet accommodates all. The most popular phrase of the people here is, if you come on board we will adjust.

programme.title: Live A Little
programme.desc: It starts with an after-party sequence. It is late at night. Nimisha, 26, struggles to get a ride back home when Atish, 46, sees this and offers her help. She refuses at first but eventually agrees. The journey gives Nimisha a peek into her boss's life. As they reach Nimisha’s destination they are ready to move on in their lives, but the night has more to offer them. Due to a sudden turn of events, they end up under one roof and despite their differences, they help each other get a new perspective

programme.title: Dry Dreams
programme.desc: We mostly don’t care about things, which we have around us and are easily available here’s one such thrilling short film about a guy who has two visitors asking for water, what happens next is an eye opener.

programme.title: Two Strangers
programme.desc: This narrative revolves around a man with a scientific background, unwaveringly devoted to science and sceptical of miracles. He’s dealing with a mysterious health condition, leaving every doctor surprised. It’s like a puzzle and everyone around him is clueless about it. In a surprising twist, destiny intervenes to miraculously resolve his health issue, and he remains oblivious to this extraordinary turn of events, adding a layer of intrigue to the unfolding narrative.

programme.title: Chand Saanse
programme.desc: Here is a story of a woman, NAYAN, She is in the waiting room of a hospital where her father-in-law is admitted. In the waiting room she sees suffering of other people. It looks the waiting room is meant waiting for death. She meets an old man who has just lost his wife but he is not aware of it. He keeps on talking about his wife as if she is still alive. That makes NAYAN to ask a question. What is the difference between life and death? Knowing about it or being unaware about it?

programme.title: Chashmadeed
programme.desc: A 60 YO woman lives with her entitled 30-year-old son and his wife. She is a doting mother to him, and like any mother, thinks of her son as ideal. One morning, she starts having a strange issue with her eyes, as her vision keeps getting blurred in erratic spasms, like a camera going out of focus and back. Upon the recommendation of her 23-year-old hip and woke neighbor, she sets out to visit an eye clinic by herself. The solution offered at this eye clinic more than clears her blurry vision.

programme.title: Complaint
programme.desc: A journey of a 12-year-old girl who visits the police station to report the disappearance of her bicycle. At the station, a police officer undertakes a heartwarming action to restore the child's trust, earning the admiration and faith of all those present. This incident serves as a powerful testament to our inherent, albeit sometimes unquestioning, belief in the police force.

programme.title: Dadi Ka Murabba
programme.desc: Ramesh dreams of a good job but his lack of fluent English hinders him. His Dadi advises him to be self-reliant, prompting him to sell murabba with her help. His business grows, and he asked to raise the flag at his old school on Independence Day. The sarpanch tells him that as a self-reliant young individual, Ramesh can add to the nation's growth. The film shows that it takes both an individual's grit and determination and the support of loved ones to achieve the impossible.

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A meticulously planned date night goes terribly wrong when the husband reveals that he will not be able to make it.

programme.title: Funkaar
programme.desc: A heart-warming tale of a mother who rediscovers her passion for her craft when her daughter pushes her beyond the confines of her daily routine.

programme.title: Hausla
programme.desc: Danish, a village boy with kabaddi dreams, faces adversity as he's unfairly removed from his team due to a dispute he didn't start. Despite family discord, his father stands by him. A new opportunity arises, showcasing Danish's talent. He's selected for the biggest game of his life, but tragedy strikes: his father passes away. Will Danish find the strength to play on, honoring his father's memory?

programme.title: Hearts Awash In Sapphire Light
programme.desc: Hearts Awash in Sapphire Light unfolds the tale of two individuals who encounter each other one evening, initially under less-than-ideal circumstances. At first, they engage in petty arguments over trivial matters. However, as time passes, the undeniable power of their connection becomes evident, serving as a poignant reminder that sometimes, the most extraordinary journeys take place within the depths of our own hearts.

programme.title: Humraz
programme.desc: This is the story of a couple who tried to raise their voice against the undesirable practice of one community. Hamraz is a witness to the hero playing Ravanahatha and the incidents that happened to him... Sometimes the image that looks white is also black... Humraz is a story full of mysteries... The curtain will soon fall on all the secrets and the real story will come out in front of everyone..

programme.title: Jama Punji
programme.desc: A late night conversation between a mother (Sarla) & her son Anshuman, 13 days after the passing of his father where they discuss the reasons for his detachment with his father and how by the end of the night, certain events lead Anshuman to accept and make amends with his deceased father.

programme.title: Keep Punching
programme.desc: Prior to realising her dream of representing the country, withdrawn boxer Kirnay must first fight the battle for her freedom outside the ring.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Love has many things hidden instore. What happens and Why does it happen? The secrets will be revealed in Kidnapped

programme.title: Loha Chor
programme.desc: A modest family from Haryana relocated to Dhanbad, Bihar, and took up residence in a government quarter that had previously been inhabited by the notorious "Loha Chor" gang during the 1980s in Bihar. The family encountered numerous challenges and social difficulties from both the local neighbourhood inhabitants and the remnants of the Loha Chor gang. Subsequently, law enforcement authorities conducted a raid on the premises. Through determination and courage, both the family and the protagonist of this story effectively navigated the situation in order to resolve the issue and find a resolution.

programme.title: Mere Shohar Ki Begam
programme.desc: Javed already married but still he wants second marriage. His first wife Rukhsar opposed him, he beats her and second day he gets his second wife Afsana at home. Because of jealousy, bitterness revenge game starts between both wives.

programme.title: Meri Ramma Sabse Special
programme.desc: After a 15-year absence, Vikrant comes back home, only to be unexpectedly entangled in a web of unresolved issues and unspoken tensions with his mother. Confronting painful truths and reopening old wounds, he embarks on a quest for answers that could mend the fractured bonds between them. In this emotionally charged narrative, Vikrant must face his past to forge a brighter future and repair the ties strained by time.

programme.title: Naam Badal Dena
programme.desc: A couple who is head over heels in love with each other with a love that's extraordinary yet relatable. The wife is told by everyone that she is too trusting of her husband. The wife makes a pact with her husband that if she ever acts like an ordinary suspecting wife he can change her name. The universe then puts her to the test on their wedding anniversary. The husband then makes her admit her true feelings as a wife and believe that possessiveness and jealousy in moderation are good.

programme.title: Ode To The Nameless
programme.desc: A 24-year-old man, struggling with societal pressure to have his first intimate experience, decides to hire a companion. Contrary to his expectations, the encounter is awkward and guilt-ridden, leading to bouts of anxiety. Surprisingly, the woman, mature beyond her years, guides him with ease and grace, helping him realize that what he was searching for couldn't be found in just a few moments of pleasure.

programme.title: Oh My Star Wife
programme.desc: Story of a young married actress struggling with societal pressure over her fashion choices. Her husband's disapproval leads to arguments and a dilemma regarding societal acceptance. Ultimately, an unexpected accident brings resolution. Watch to explore how the protagonist navigates through societal expectations and challenges in her personal life.

programme.title: Parinay
programme.desc: The narrative explores our thought processes, whose opinions we value, and how we handle a common issue faced by many couples: when a minor disagreement escalates into a pointless argument.

programme.title: Dimming Shadows
programme.desc: The husband and wife both suffer from dementia, but with the help of a compassionate doctor and nurse, they make an effort to recover. Unfortunately, their attempts are unsuccessful, but their daughter finds solace in visualizing her parents as alive through virtual reality

programme.title: Kundli
programme.desc: Kundli - is a film about values in life, which change some decisions against the will of the characters. It's about two meetings of these characters in a different time period and shows the changes that have occurred in their lives. Though along with time things have changed but there are something’s which are unforgettable at the back of the mind. Kundli is a film about small things that have remained though the times have changed.

programme.title: Black Coffee
programme.desc: Film director Tara uncovers her sister Vanya's betrayal in a relationship and decides to take dramatic action. In a jaw-dropping twist, Tara stages their deaths in a short film. The lines between fiction and reality blur as Tara invites her real sister for coffee after the shoot, leaving the audience questioning what is real.

programme.title: Famous
programme.desc: Once a huge superstar now faded into oblivion, submerges himself into alcohol and drugs to escape reality. One day fate makes him meet his biggest fan in an unusual circumstance.

programme.title: French Date
programme.desc: Promila, a beautiful but lonely woman in a busy city, frequently on internet dating sites, meets Arun who's also stricken with a singlehood status for his whole life. As they both decide to spend some casual time together one evening. French Date, at first feels like a normal romantic story, which it is, but soon the viewer realizes something is different. The short film shall keep the grey matter in your brain active and you might find yourself on the edge of your seat.

programme.title: Juwaa
programme.desc: Tillu, a struggling villager, gambles his wife's mangalsutra for a shot at change. Against the odds, he wins—but discovers the real gamble is just beginning. A tale of hope, sacrifice, and the unexpected twists of life.

programme.title: Namak Halaal
programme.desc: Simpleton Kallu is falsely imprisoned by Shahani Seth, learning criminal ways from hardened inmates. He escapes, determined to destroy Shahani.

programme.title: Aap Beati
programme.desc: An ill-fated love triangle forms between friends Vijay and Vikram, both in love with the same girl. She loves debt-ridden Vijay, but her family insists she marry affluent Vikram.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Jeet
programme.desc: The film makes a strong commentary on the condition and struggles of women in Indian society thorugh the harrowing story of a woman named Soni. From being a chirpy and naive village girl, Soni turns into a rebel with a cause once she endures injustice at the hands of the villagers ready to ostracise her.

programme.title: Gair Kaanooni
programme.desc: Police officers Karan and Ali investigate a colleague's murder. Karan protects Anjali, a bar dancer and key witness. His falling for her compromises his objectivity.

programme.title: Deewaar
programme.desc: Brothers Vijay and Ravi Verma, sons of a disgraced unionist, follow different paths: Vijay, a smuggler; Ravi, a cop hunting him. Raised by their poor single mother in Bombay, they face hardships.

programme.title: Trishul
programme.desc: Vijay Kumar, illegitimate son of construction baron Raj Kumar Gupta, seeks revenge after his mother's death. He aims to destroy the Gupta family's business and connections.

programme.title: Farishtay
programme.desc: Young Gayatri is devastated when husband Arjun is brutally killed. She's horrified to learn her brothers, Veeru and Dheeru, who helped her marry Arjun, work for his killer.
